keyMoments.title: Donquixote Pirates Attack Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Giolla, a member of the Donquixote Pirates, invades the Thousand Sunny as part of the plan to trap the Straw Hats in Dressrosa and capture Momonosuke.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Donquixote Pirates' strategic approach to eliminating threats.

keyMoments.title: Diamante Orders Bellamy to Kill Luffy
keyMoments.description: Diamante gives Bellamy orders to assassinate Luffy as a test of loyalty to earn a higher position in the Donquixote Family.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the manipulative nature of the Donquixote Pirates' leadership.

jollyRoger.description: A smiley face with a wide grin similar to Doflamingo's signature smile

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Transformed into Art
keyMoments.description: Nami, Brook, Chopper, and Momonosuke are transformed into abstract art by Giolla, leaving them unable to defend the Thousand Sunny effectively.
keyMoments.significance: The crew faces a unique threat that requires them to overcome their transformed state.

keyMoments.title: Lucy Becomes Crowd Favorite
keyMoments.description: Luffy (as Lucy) becomes immensely popular with the Corrida Colosseum crowd after defeating the giant Hajrudin.
keyMoments.significance: Increases Luffy's profile and makes it harder to maintain his disguise.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
